attributes.action: Introduce legislation in the UK making it illegal to use expressions such as 'For Christ Sake', or 'Jesus Christ' either on televsion or the theatre, either as a word of cursing, an expression of frustration, or in any way to entertain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is very offensive to Christians to hear the Name of God being used in this blasphemous way.  It is unheard of to utter expressions such as 'For Allah's sake', or 'Mohammad'.  Such expressions of disrespect would attract a great deal of protest from Muslims, and since the UK is a Christian country it is reasonable for Christianity to be graanted the same level of respect as other religions.
